summary: Summarydearcloud's quilted & embossed Vita-Cica Pore Clarity Toner Pads for gentle exfoliation and radiant, clear skin. Your daily skin fix, and blemish-fighter. Infused with Vitamin C and Madecassoside for a brighter, toned appearance.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps tone & brighten dark spotsFor all skin types & sensitive skinMade in KoreaKey IngredientsVitamin C - For a radiant, clear glow from within.Madecassoside - helps repair & tone blemishes.Formulated WithoutParabenSulfateItem 2634907How To UseAfter cleansing, gently wipe the toner pad across skin, focusing on blemish-prone or dry areas.Lightly pat into skin to promote absorption.For extra hydration, wear toner pad on your face for 10--15 minutes.Follow with your favorite serum or moisturizer.IngredientsAlcohol, Octocrylene, Homosalate, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Octisalate, Water, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Avobenzone, Benzyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethyl Hexanediol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Madecassic Acid, Asiaticoside, Asiatic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Fragrance.
how_to_use: After cleansing, gently wipe the toner pad across skin, focusing on blemish-prone or dry areas.Lightly pat into skin to promote absorption.For extra hydration, wear toner pad on your face for 10--15 minutes.Follow with your favorite serum or moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Great Toner Pads
reviews.comments: So far I really like these toner pads. I use them in the evening as part of my skin care routine before bed. I have had no adverse reactions and they seem to be moisturizing. I am a little disappointed that mine did not come with the small plastic tweezers to get the pads out. However my fingers seem to work just fine and will probably repurchase because I want to use for at least 3 months to see if it will help with my sun spots for reference I am 46 years old and have just now begun a skin care routine.
